verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> [was] seven שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years יֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> Joash בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <WH6645> also [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> of Beersheba

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did יוֹאָ֛שׁ <WH3101> And Joash הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> all the days יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וַיִּשָּׂא־ <WH5375> took ל֥וֹ יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <WH3077> And Jehoiada נָשִׁ֣ים <WH802> wives שְׁתָּ֑יִם <WH8147> for him two וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and he begat בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵיכֵ֑ן <WH310> And it came to pass after הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came עִם־ <WH5973> with לֵ֣ב <WH3820> was minded יוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH3101> this [that] Joash לְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH2318> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּץ֮ <WH6908> And he gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּם֒ <WH3881> and the Levites וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֡ם צְא֣וּ <WH3318> to them Go out לְעָרֵ֪י <WH5892> unto the cities יְהוּדָ֟ה <WH3063> of Judah וְקִבְצוּ֩ <WH6908> and gather מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of all Israel כֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> money לְחַזֵּ֣ק ׀ <WH2388> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> of your God מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> from שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year בְּשָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> to year וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> and you תְּמַהֲר֣וּ <WH4116> and see that ye hasten לַדָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> the matter וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מִֽהֲר֖וּ <WH4116> hastened הַֽלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> Howbeit the Levites

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> And the king לִֽיהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> for Jehoiada הָרֹאשׁ֒ <WH7218> the chief וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ מַדּ֙וּעַ֙ <WH4069> Why לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not דָרַ֣שְׁתָּ <WH1875> unto him Why hast thou not required עַל־ <WH5921> and הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> of the Levites לְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> to bring in מִֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> out of Judah וּמִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and out of Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> מַשְׂאַת֙ <WH4864> the collection מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> [according to the commandment] of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> and of the congregation לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> for the tabernacle הָעֵדֽוּת׃ <WH5715> testimony

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH6271> of Athaliah הַמִּרְשַׁ֔עַת <WH4849> that wicked בָּנֶ֥יהָ <WH1121> For the sons פָרְצ֖וּ <WH6555> woman had broken up אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְגַם֙ <WH1571> and even כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner קָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> and also all the dedicated things בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> did they bestow לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> upon Baalim

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> commandment הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And at the king's וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> they made אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> chest אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> a וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛הוּ <WH5414> and set בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> at the gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD חֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> it without

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> And they made ק֞וֹל <WH6963> a proclamation בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> through Judah וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem לְהָבִ֤יא <WH935> to bring in לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> to the LORD מַשְׂאַ֞ת <WH4864> the collection מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> [that] Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God עַל־ <WH5921> on יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> [laid] upon Israel בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> rejoiced כָל־ <WH3605> All הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> And all the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> and all the people וַיָּבִ֛יאוּ <WH935> and brought in וַיַּשְׁלִ֥יכוּ <WH7993> and cast לָאָר֖וֹן <WH727> into the chest עַד־ <WH5704> until לְכַלֵּֽה׃ <WH3615> until they had made an end

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> came בְּעֵת֩ <WH6256> Now it came to pass that at what time יָבִ֨יא <WH935> was brought אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָר֜וֹן <WH727> the chest אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּקֻדַּ֣ת <WH6486> office הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> unto the king's בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> by the hand הַלְוִיִּם֒ <WH3881> of the Levites וְכִרְאוֹתָ֞ם <WH7200> and when they saw כִּי־ <WH3588> there was רַ֣ב <WH7227> that [there was] much הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> money וּבָ֨א <WH935> came סוֹפֵ֤ר <WH5608> scribe הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's וּפְקִיד֙ <WH6496> officer כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest's הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> and the high וִיעָ֙רוּ֙ <WH6168> and emptied אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <WH727> the chest וְיִשָּׂאֻ֖הוּ <WH5375> and took וִֽישִׁיבֻ֣הוּ <WH7725> again אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> it to his place כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> Thus they did לְי֣וֹם ׀ <WH3117> day בְּי֔וֹם <WH3117> by day וַיַּֽאַסְפוּ־ <WH622> and gathered כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> money לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> in abundance

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨הוּ <WH5414> gave הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וִֽיהוֹיָדָ֗ע <WH3077> and Jehoiada אֶל־ <WH413> to עוֹשֵׂה֙ <WH6213> it to such as did מְלֶ֙אכֶת֙ <WH4399> the work עֲבוֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> of the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become שֹׂכְרִים֙ <WH7936> and hired חֹצְבִ֣ים <WH2672> masons וְחָרָשִׁ֔ים <WH2796> and carpenters לְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH2318> to repair בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְ֠גַם <WH1571> and also לְחָרָשֵׁ֤י <WH2796> and also such as wrought בַרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> iron וּנְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> and brass לְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to mend אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> wrought עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> labored הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> and the work וַתַּ֧עַל <WH5927> was אֲרוּכָ֛ה <WH724> perfected לַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> work בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> by them וַֽיַּעֲמִ֜ידוּ <WH5975> and they set אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֧ית <WH1004> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God עַל־ <WH5921> according מַתְכֻּנְתּ֖וֹ <WH4971> in his state וַֽיְאַמְּצֻֽהוּ׃ <WH553> and strengthened

וּֽכְכַלּוֹתָ֡ם <WH3615> And when they had finished הֵבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> [it] they brought לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וִֽיהוֹיָדָ֜ע <WH3077> and Jehoiada אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> the rest הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> of the money וַיַּעֲשֵׂ֨הוּ <WH6213> whereof were made כֵלִ֤ים <WH3627> vessels לְבֵית־ <WH1004> for the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> [even] vessels שָׁרֵ֔ת <WH8335> to minister וְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> and to offer וְכַפּ֔וֹת <WH3709> [withal] and spoons וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> and vessels זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold וָכָ֑סֶף <WH3701> and silver וַ֠יִּֽהְיוּ <WH1961> become מַעֲלִ֨ים <WH5927> And they offered עֹל֤וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD תָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> continually כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days יְהוֹיָדָֽע׃ <WH3077> of Jehoiada פ

וַיִּזְקַ֧ן <WH2204> waxed old יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <WH3077> But Jehoiada וַיִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> and was full יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> of days וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> when he died בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֧ה <WH3967> an hundred וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> and thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בְּמוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> [was he] when he died

וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <WH6912> And they buried בְעִיר־ <WH5892> him in the city דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David עִם־ <WH5973> among הַמְּלָכִ֑ים <WH4428> among the kings כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> because he had done טוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> good בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel וְעִ֥ם <WH5973> among הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> both toward God וּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> and toward his house ס

וְאַֽחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> Now after מוֹת֙ <WH4194> the death יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> came שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> and made obeisance לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אָ֛ז <WH227> for שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּֽעַזְב֗וּ <WH5800> And they left אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers וַיַּֽעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <WH842> groves וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֲצַבִּ֑ים <WH6091> and idols וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> came קֶ֗צֶף <WH7110> and wrath עַל־ <WH5921> upon יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> came upon Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem בְּאַשְׁמָתָ֖ם <WH819> for this their trespass זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> He

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> Yet he sent בָּהֶם֙ נְבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> prophets לַהֲשִׁיבָ֖ם <WH7725> to them to bring them again אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיָּעִ֥ידוּ <WH5749> and they testified בָ֖ם וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֶאֱזִֽינוּ׃ <WH238> against them but they would not give ear ס

וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God לָֽבְשָׁה֙ <WH3847> came אֶת־ <WH853> זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> upon Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> which stood מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> above the people וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֜ם כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God לָמָה֩ <WH4100> Why אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֜ים <WH5674> Why transgress אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֤ת <WH4687> ye the commandments יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot תַצְלִ֔יחוּ <WH6743> that ye cannot prosper כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH5800> ? because ye have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיַּֽעֲזֹ֥ב <WH5800> he hath also forsaken אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיִּקְשְׁר֣וּ <WH7194> And they conspired עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against וַיִּרְגְּמֻ֥הוּ <WH7275> against him and stoned אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> him with stones בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> at the commandment הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בַּחֲצַ֖ר <WH2691> in the court בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
